name: H7-1 - Clandestine Laboratories
intro: This questionnaire verifies your knowledge of the safety procedures and liaison requirements for incidents involving clandestine drug laboratories as defined in NCI 14

structure.description: What are the three significant hazards identified in Clandestine Laboratories?
Which agency is the lead agency at a clandestine laboratory incident?
What must the first three control measures be at a suspected clandestine laboratory incident?
options: Check that laboratory is currently operational
Remove apparatus to a safe place

structure.description: Which of these signs OUTSIDE a building may indicate a clandestine laboratory is inside the building?
options: Multiple vehicles and vans parked outside
High security measures - Cameras, barbed wire fence, Guard dogs
correctAnswer: Multiple vehicles and vans parked outside
High security measures - Cameras, barbed wire fence, Guard dogs

structure.description: Which of these signs INSIDE a building might indicate a clandestine laboratory?
options: Heavy orange staining of the interior
Large amounts of food in storage
correctAnswer: Heavy orange staining of the interior
